data.title: File 87: Ancestors of Paul Bailey MCBRIDE
data.text:
Ancestors of Paul Bailey MCBRIDE

[Contents][Bottom][Next][Previous][Surnames][Index][References][Home][Mail] Alfhild Gandoldottier [Pedigree]

Alfonso I of Portugal 1st King of Portugal (1110-1185) [Pedigree]

Son of Henry_I of Portugal Count of Portugal, Burgundy (1066-1112) and Therasa of_Castile (1070-1130)

Count of Portugal; recovered Lisbon from the Moors. b. 25 Jul 1110, Guimaraes, Portugal d. 6 Dec 1185, Coimbra, Portugal bur. Holy Cross Church, Coimbra, Portugal

Married first Matilda of_Savoy (1125-1157)

Children:

Urraca of_Portugal (1151-1178) m. Ferdinand_II King of Leon (1135-1188)

Sancho I of Portugal King of Portugal (1154-1212)

Married second Elvira Gualtar

Children:

Teresa of PORTUGAL (1157-1218) m. Eudes III de BOURGOGNE Duke of Burgundy (1166-1218)

References: [ES],[PlantagenetA],[AR7],[MRL],[Paget1],[Omnibus], [Theroff]

Alfonso II Alfonsez "el Casto" (1174-1269) [Pedigree]

Son of Alfonso II Raimundez King of Aragon And Pamplona (1152-1196) and Sancha de Castile Princess of Castile (1154-1208)

b. ABT 1174 r. Aragon, Spain d. BEF 1 Dec 1269, Palermo, Sicily, Italy

Married Gersinde II de FORCALQUIER (1180-1209)

Children:

Raymond Berenger V (IV) of_Provence Count of Provence and Forcalquier (1198-1245) m. Beatrice of SAVOY Countess of Savoy (1201-1266)

References: [GENSERV],[AR7]

Alfonso II Raimundez King of Aragon And Pamplona (1152-1196) [Pedigree]

Son of Raymond Berenger IV of Barcelona Marquis of Barcelona (1113-1162) and Petronilla de Aragon (1135-1173)

b. 4 Apr 1152 b. May 1152, Villa Mayer de Valles, Aragon, Spain b. Mar 1156/7 d. 25 Apr 1196, Perpignan, Pyrennes-Orientales, France

Married Sancha de Castile Princess of Castile (1154-1208)

Children:

Alfonso II Alfonsez "el Casto" (1174-1269) m. Gersinde II de FORCALQUIER (1180-1209)

Pedro II de Aragon-Catalonia King of Aragon (1176-1213) m. Marie de Montpellier (1182-1218)

References: [AR7],[GENSERV],[MannEd],[Weis1],[RFC]

Alfonso IX "the Slobberer" of Leon King of Leon (1166-1229) [Pedigree]

Son of Ferdinand_II King of Leon (1135-1188) and Urraca of_Portugal (1151-1178)

Foamed at the mouth in fits of rage. b. 1166 b. 15 Aug 1171, Zamora, Leon, Spain d. 1229 d. 24 Sep 1230, Villanueva de Sarria, Castile, Spain

Children:

Fernando_III "the Saint" King of Castile and Leon (1199-1252) m(1) Elisabeth (-1235)

Alfonso de Molino Count of Molino (1203-1272)

Married third Agnes de MENDOZA

Married fourth Aldonca Martinez de SYLVA

Children:

Aldonca Alfonso de LEON (-1266)

Alfonso VII de Leï¿½n-Castile King of Castile and Leon (1105-1157) [Pedigree]

Son of Raymond de Bourgogne Count of Castile (1060-1107) and Urraca of Castile and Leon Queen of Leon and Castile (1082-1125)

Emperor of Spain. King of Galicia, Toledo, Zaragoza and the Asturias. b. 1 Mar 1105, Castile, Spain b. 1103 b. 1 Mar 1104/5 d. 21 Aug 1157, Fresneda, Spain bur. Cathedral of Santa Maria, Toledo, Spain

Married second Gontrode de ASTURIAS

Children:

Children:

Sancha de Castile Princess of Castile (1154-1208) m. Alfonso II Raimundez King of Aragon And Pamplona (1152-1196)

Alfonso_VI King of Castile & Leon (1039-1109) [Pedigree]

Son of Fernando_I the_Great King of Castile, Leon, Navarre (1016-1065) and Sancha of_Leon (1013-1067)

He was married an 8th time after 1107 to Beatriz de Este, who survived him. b. 1039 b. Jun 1040 d. 20 Jun 1109, Toledo, Spain

Married first Ximena Nunia de_Guzman (-1128)

Children:

Elvira Alfonso of Castile (-1151) m(1) Raimund IV Duke of Narbonne, Count of Toulouse (-1105)

Therasa of_Castile (1070-1130) m(1) Henry_I of Portugal Count of Portugal, Burgundy (1066-1112)

Married fourth Constance of_Burgundy (1046-1092)

Children:

Urraca of Castile and Leon Queen of Leon and Castile (1082-1125) m(1) Raymond de Bourgogne Count of Castile (1060-1107)

Married fifth Zaida (Zayda) of Seville (1075-)

Children:

Sancha of Castile (1100-) m(2) Rodrigo Gonzalez "el Franco" de Lara

Elvira of CASTILE (-1135) m. Roger II of Sicily (1095-1154)

Married sixth Bertha of Burgundy

Married seventh Elisabeth (Isabel) of France (-1108)

Alfonso_VIII King of Castile (1155-1214) [Pedigree]

Son of Sancho_III King of Castile (1135-1158) and Blanche of_Navarre (1135-1158)

They had 4 sons and 8 daughters. Led the coalition against the Moorish Almohades. b. 11 Nov 1155, Soria, Castile d. 5 Oct 1214, near Avevalo, Castile
